answers.answer: Probably not because it contains sugar free artificial sweeteners. However, if you are on diabetes medication its best to talk with your pharmacist about drug interactions, especially if you use insulin.

question: I Have  Type II Diabetes and chew 8-10 pieces of 4mg nicorette gum per day.  Will this effect my blood sugar readings?RHThis discussion is related to/posts/show/641686.
title: Does nicorette gum effect blood sugar levels
